Title: Scrummy - the distributed project manager
Description: Scrummy is the new way of managing agile projects. You'll no longer have to use central servers. It's developed in C# although libraries written in VB.NET are cool, too. As a pattern we will use MVVM.
HomeWiki:
Scrummy is the new way of managing agile projects. You'll no longer have to use central servers. It's developed in C# although libraries written in VB.NET are cool, too. As a pattern we will use MVVM.
